name: Alianza
overview: Alianza, Inc. provides hosted voice solutions for the wireless broadband industry. It offers a hosted voice platform that enables broadband service providers to deploy VoIP services. Its platform components include a carrier-grade session border controller, soft switch, carrier interface, virtual PBX, billing support system, and a device provisioning module. The company also provides Logic Layer that integrates the independent components of the foundation, and provides an interface between the foundation, and Account Management Portal (AMP) and Alianza Tools and Administrative Center (ATAC); Application Programming Interface, a development platform for creating Web-based services; AMP that gives end-users the ability to manage their personalized account by retrieving valuable reports and information; and ATAC, a back-office management system that includes staging management, administrative tools, help desk, and a reporting interface. Its platform enables operators to offer services to residential, SMB, enterprise, and mobile end-users. Alianza, Inc. was founded in 2003 and is headquartered in Lindon, Utah.
